en.welcome1: Hello there, welcome to the Fruit Fruit Warehouse, I'm Toby, your guide on this wonderful endeavor.
en.welcome2: Currently our warehouse needs all the help we can get to deliver this boxes of fruit to our client.
en.controlTutorial1: I think you are the right person to handle this job! But first let's pick up to one of the fruit box.
en.controlTutorial2: Now lets put the box on the grid.
en.controlTutorial3: Great, let's get to the next room!
en.mechanicTutorial1: As you can see, the apple boxes have 3 apples inside them.
en.mechanicTutorial2: Our job here is to make sure the have the correct amount of fruit to deliver.
en.mechanicTutorial3: Now let's try putting one box in every grid.
en.mechanicTutorial5: Since we sorted 5 boxes into the grid lets determine how many apples are there.
en.mechanicTutorial6: You're a natural! Let's proceed to the next room!
en.gameTutorial1: Now this is interesting, so each type of box have the same quantity inside them.
en.gameTutorial2: Each box category have 5 fruits in them
en.gameTutorial3: Let's try aligning them first on the grid.
en.gameTutorial4: Now all we have to do is to determine how many fruits are there.
en.gameTutorial5: I know you could do it, great work!
en.gameStart: Now to the real thing, let's ship some fruits!
en.challenge1: Determined how many fruits are there!
en.challenge2: Determined how many box required to fulfill the order!
en.question: How many
en.progression2: Nice work! It's time for the next one!
en.progression3: You're a natural, orders are almost completed!
en.progression4: Awesome! You've completed all of the orders, thank you for helping! Until next time.
